summary: During the Mexican Revolution, a macho rebel general falls in love with the independent-minded daughter of an aristocrat in the town he is occupying.
cast: María Félix|Pedro Armendáriz|Fernando Fernández|José Morcillo|Eduardo Arozamena|Miguel Inclán|Manuel Dondé|Eugenio Rossi|Norma Hill|Juan García|José Torvay|Pascual García Peña|Daniel Arroyo|Guillermo Calles|Rogelio Fernández|Beatriz Germán Fuentes|Cecilia Leger|Manuel Pozos|Enriqueta Reza|Arturo Soto Rangel
title: Enamorada
